definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: wander restlessly, roam (cf. Ar. ra0da (w) go to and fro [Nö:ZMG xxxvii (1883), 539], Eth. roda: run upon, invade, attack);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[עִד רָד עִם אֵל]] Ho 12:1, fig., crpt., LXX appar. [[עַתָּ יְדָעָם]], We [[עִדַּר דַּעַת]] lacks knowledge, Now [[יָדֻעַ]], Bewer:JBL xxi (1902), 108 f. [[עׂד יְדָעָס]]; 1 pl. [[רֵדְנוּ]] Je 2:31 fig. of Isr.; read [[וְרַדְתִּי]] perh. Ju Jdg 11:37 lit., v. [[ירד]]

definitions.title: 1 g. Hiph.
definitions.body: shew restlessness: Impf. 2 ms. [[כַּאֲשֶׁר תָּרִיד]] Ge 27:40 (dub. Nö:l. c. 540); 1 s. [[אָדִיד בְּשִׂיתִי]] Ps 55:3 I shew restlessness (?) in my murmuring.
